不同的存款管道可能影響存款金額到達玩家錢包的時間。最遲一個營業日為合理的範圍。: Different deposit method may affect when the deposit amount reaches the player's wallet. One business day at the latest is a reasonable range
1.OCOIN是客人在マハラジャ遊玩的幣別總稱: 1. OCOIN is the general term for the currency that guests play in Maharajya
2.因為選擇的送金方法有所不同，在帳戶上反映的時間是入金之後最多一個營業日為範圍: 2. Because the selected method of sending money is different, the time reflected in the account is at most one business day after the deposit.
